page.title: 15Living standards in PAUNTLEY
page.content:
{Central Heating}is in all but 26 homes {Oil}(31) and{solid fuel}(21) are the most popular fuels.{Electric night {storage}heating (24) provides either full or supplementary central heating. {Liquid Petroleum Gas}heats 5 homes. {Open fires (56)}and{wood burning {stoves}(29) are the most popular forms of heating rooms. Additional heating is provided by portable paraffin or L.P.G. or electric heaters.
{Cooking}is done by{electricity}in 64 homes,{solid fuel}(19),{L.P.G.}(10), {oil-fired}"Rayburn"(4),{oil}(1). {Microwave}cookers are in use in 9 homes. Two homes have{Halogen electric {hobs.}There are 88{refrigerators,}20 {fridge-freezers,}71{freezers}and 16 {automatic dishwashers.
